page.title: 15Transport, Gipsey Bridge
page.content: This information was taken from a traffic survey taken in the village of Gipsey Bridge Between 8.50a.m. and 1.00p.m. on a week day in July. Farm vehicles seem to use the road more before 9.00 a.m. whereas there were more lorries betweeen 12.30 and 1.00p.m.During the period 8.50 a.m. to 11.00a.m. only the number of passing cars exceded the amount of vans. In all the time that the survey was run no buses came through the village and most of the people that we interviewed in the village thought that there should be more public transport in the area . Neither in the survey nor in our questionnaire taken around the village did motorbikes emerge as a major form of transport for the people of the area.
